name: rerelease
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
to make a record or film available for people to buy or see for a second time: There are plans to rerelease all the band's albums online.

[ C or U ] the act of rereleasing music or a film: After a recent rerelease, sales of the album increased to more than 20,000.
[ C ] music or video that has been rereleased: I went to see the rerelease of "The Jungle Book".
